name: astrorante
title: Astrorante
desc: Combining the power of Astro, Storyblok CMS, Vue, and Tailwind, AstroRante delivers an unparalleled online presence for your restaurant.
article:
Astrorante is a cutting-edge, versatile fast and static theme for restaurants. I seamlessly integrates static pages with the Storyblok CMS visual editor.


Key Features

  • Hybrid deploy for static pages and Storyblok CMS visual editor in SSR
  • Flexible restaurant menu
  • Multi-language support
  • Theme colors and fonts can be adjusted in the CMS
  • Utilizes modern font stacks
  • Google PageSpeed mobile score of 98-100
  • Tested in Vercel & Netlify
  • Easy Storyblok setup for Datasources, Bloks and Stories.

github.name: Astrorante
github.description: AstroRante is a state-of-the-art website theme crafted for fine dining establishments. Combining the power of Astro, Storyblok CMS, Vue, and Tailwind, AstroRante delivers an unparalleled online presence for your restaurant.
